sense.def: Illness Sign identical with luan tong 攣痛 . Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 19: 六生散，療急風痹，身軀拘痛 方 , “Powder with the six raw ingredients: recipe to cure acute wind blockage, and cramps with pain affecting the entire body”. Ju tou 疽頭 , head of an impediment - illness [1]

Pathological Item Combined Designation of the central elevation or tip of yong 癰 , obstruction-illness, and ju 疽 , impediment-illness. It is from here that the pus is discharged. BCGM Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：疽頭凹黑，(蕎麥)煮食即起 , “When the head of an impediment-illness is sunken in and black, eat boiled [ qiao mai ] and it will rise”.
